creator: rlecocq@sopragroup.com
text:
It would be really interesting to be able to read an HSSFRow object, clone it, 
and be able to insert that row at a defined position. This would provide a 
mechanism that reproduce the Excel behavior when you "copy" a row, and then 
select an other row, and choose "Insert Copied Cells" command.

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: I don't expect this to be done anytime soon without substantial code-contribution as part of the bug-entry, if you are still interested and can provide a starting implementation, then please reopen this bug with the proposed changes attached.
